title: Advanced Math Modeling Course Based on Remote Laboratories

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics (calculus, linear algebra) and experience in experimental data analysis
context.additional_context: Course focused on professionals solving real-world industrial problems through mathematical modeling

learning_goals: Learners can build a differential equation model with 80% accuracy based on data collected from a remote laboratory platform.
Learners can analyze physical systems implemented in a VR environment and apply numerical analysis techniques (e.g., finite difference methods).
Learners can perform statistical validation (hypothesis testing, regression analysis) based on remote experiment results to derive meaningful conclusions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
